title: After 6.20 update loggin contiues till it times out
body: I log in it says im loggin in goes till it gives me the link to go to support. The support page is broke so ive just been continuing this viscous cycle ive seen him revive that flower more times then I care too... help I haven't played sense release.

replies.body: It sounds like your network can't connect to the login servers, so it's timing out.  Our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help with this, but I know you mention that the support page is broken.  Can you tell me what exactly you're seeing or what's wrong with it?  Let me know!
This page cant be displayed. the link you just gave me cant be displayed either.

I'm thinking your support page might be cached to another region.  On the top right of the support page, what language do you have it set to?  Make sure it is English (US).  You can also try another browser or Incognito Mode.  Let me know if that helps!
reset router guess I needed to after update don't know why I  didn't try that before thought it had something to do with the update thank you sorry
case closed after new update had to restart router don't know why I didn't try that before my bad.
